text: Should A Mother Tell? is a lost The Library of Congress/FIAF American Silent Feature Film Survival Catalog:Should A Mother Tell? 1915 silent film drama directed by J. Gordon Edwards and starring Betty Nansen. The scenario was by future director Rex Ingram with the film being produced and distributed by Fox Film Corporation.The AFI Catalog of Feature Films 1893-1993:Should A Mother Tell?Should A Mother Tell? at silentera.com ==Cast== ==References== ==External links== * Should A Mother Tell? at IMDb.com * Category:1915 films Category:Lost American films Category:American black-and-white films Category:Fox Film films Category:Films directed by J.
